patterns.name: Added
patterns.description: New import/require/use statements added. ONLY when the entire hunk is adding imports, with no other code changes.

patterns.name: Removed
patterns.description: Import/require/use statements deleted. ONLY when the entire hunk is removing imports, with no other code changes.

patterns.name: Reordered
patterns.description: Import statements reordered or sorted. The same imports exist before and after, just in different order or grouping.

categories.name: Formatting
categories.description: Whitespace and style changes with NO semantic meaning

patterns.name: Whitespace
patterns.description: Changes ONLY to whitespace: adding/removing blank lines, changing indentation, adjusting spaces or tabs. Includes hunks that only add or remove empty lines. NOT for any change to actual code characters, strings, numbers, identifiers, or template/markup tags (e.g., `{% endif %}`, `<div>`, `{{ }}`). Removing or adding template tags is a structural code change, not whitespace.

patterns.name: Line length
patterns.description: Code wrapped or unwrapped for line length limits. The code tokens are identical, just split across lines differently.

patterns.name: Style
patterns.description: Punctuation style changes only: semicolons added/removed, single vs double quotes, trailing commas. NOT for any logic or value changes.

patterns.name: Added
patterns.description: New comments added. ONLY when the entire hunk is adding comments, with no code changes. If the hunk also adds, removes, or modifies any code, use `review:required` instead.

patterns.name: Removed
patterns.description: Comments deleted. ONLY when the entire hunk is removing comments, with no code changes.

patterns.name: Modified
patterns.description: Existing comment text updated. ONLY when the entire hunk is editing comments, with no code changes. If the hunk also changes any code logic (even one line), use `review:required` instead.

categories.name: Types
categories.description: Type annotation changes in typed languages

patterns.name: Added
patterns.description: Type annotations added to previously untyped code (e.g., adding `: string` or `-> int`). Runtime behavior unchanged.

patterns.name: Modified
patterns.description: Type annotations changed (e.g., `string` to `string | null`). NOT for changes to actual values or logic, only type declarations.

patterns.name: Removed
patterns.description: Type annotations removed from code. The runtime logic remains identical.

patterns.name: Renamed
patterns.description: File renamed within the same directory. Content is identical or nearly identical.

patterns.name: Moved
patterns.description: File moved to a different directory. Content is identical or nearly identical.

patterns.name: Lock file
patterns.description: Package manager lock files: package-lock.json, yarn.lock, pnpm-lock.yaml, Cargo.lock, Gemfile.lock, poetry.lock, go.sum.

categories.name: Rename
categories.description: Identifier renaming with no logic changes

patterns.name: Variable
patterns.description: A variable or constant renamed throughout the hunk. Logic unchanged, only the identifier name differs.

patterns.name: Function
patterns.description: A function or method renamed. Implementation unchanged, only the function name differs.

patterns.name: Class
patterns.description: A class, struct, interface, or type renamed. Implementation unchanged, only the type name differs.

patterns.name: Required
patterns.description: The hunk contains meaningful changes that require careful human review. Use this as the default when the change does not match any trivial/mechanical pattern.
